p: The novel coronavirus is transmitted through droplets and respiratory secretions of individuals infected by the disease or through contaminated objects; this virus can be also transmitted through contaminated feces ( 5) . Health workers are advised to observe contact and droplet precautions, according to the procedures performed. Hence, complete Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) has to be worn, such as disposable waterproof aprons or gown, goggles, head covers, gloves, and N95 masks or PFF2 respirators. Care is advised when removing PPE ( 9) .
